channel.title: Tech Help with Packet Sniffing
channel.description:
I play a game called TerraWorld Online (terragaming.net). Its a game which you download to your computer and play it from there. I want to know if I could cheat the game by intercepting packets that I send to the server and sending them over and over. Does anyone have any knowledge of this stuff?
Thanks!

item.title: Tech Help with Packet Sniffing
item.dc:creator: @Quilby Quilby
item.description:
@Quilby wrote:

Thanks for the link marauder. Looks like I will be able to find help at elitepvpers.de.

Read full topic

item.title: Tech Help with Packet Sniffing
item.dc:creator: @marauder1 marauder1
item.description:
@marauder1 wrote:

huh?
you mine and the stuff drop themself? weird…
anyway, for conquer hax i used this called cotobo, it is a miner which automines om multiple chars (if you made multi-login hack) and you can get it at elitepvpers.de forums.

Read full topic

Hmm…im going to try the game out see if i can find anything that will help you

Read full topic

item.title: Tech Help with Packet Sniffing
item.dc:creator: @Quilby Quilby
item.description:
@Quilby wrote:

SETO:

i sometime play conquer online there were good packet sniffers for it and bots made from it (the game is full of bots and GM’s really don’t do anything

For TerraWorld there are no bots/cheats/hacks or anything like that. Everyone plays the game normally, and that it why I am having a hard time find a way to cheat it. (Although I could use scar I wanna first know if I can do the packet sniffing way.

leader:

I got to try this game out. If I find out anything, I will let you know.

Thanks for trying out the game. You should also download Wpe Pro (do a google search and you will find a couple of links).
Remember, the site is terragaming.net

Therealjdb, because no one cheats on TerraWorld I dought that they have good protection…

Ok so can anyone understand the packets that I uploaded? Does anyone know how to use those wpe pro filters?

Read full topic

item.title: Tech Help with Packet Sniffing
item.dc:creator: @Quilby Quilby
item.description:
@Quilby wrote:

Ok I was minning and these are the packets that I recieved and sent:

The first logs are from when I logged in. The username that I used was quilby. After the login I was minning.
http://upit.be/download.php?id=3973

Here I was minning and standing around. Also after you mine in terraworld sometimes you will get items. But they will be on the floor and you have to pick them.
http://upit.be/download.php?id=3974

Read full topic

ok then post them?

Read full topic

item.title: Tech Help with Packet Sniffing
item.dc:creator: @Quilby Quilby
item.description:
@Quilby wrote:

So how did Kaitnieks use AutoRune in runescape 1?

Also the game that I am talking about does not have any cheaters/macroers. So I dont think that the security is too high. Also I will post here a couple of packets that I intercepted. Although most is of the packet is encrypted there are still some parts which are in english.

Read full topic

item.title: Tech Help with Packet Sniffing
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

from my experience, the packets are likely encrypted in some way, and a program with unencrypted packets for a mmorpg has not been seen for many many years.
so dont try sniffing it. it wont work. use SCAR on it or something.

Read full topic
